distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for tiff fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-48281: Fixed a buffer overflow that could be triggered via
  a crafted image (bsc#1207413).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: processCropSelections in tools/tiffcrop.c in LibTIFF through 4.5.0 has a heap-based buffer overflow (e.g., "WRITE of size 307203") via a crafted TIFF image.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
